itunes:title: MAY 31 2022 - BIDEN ADMIN DECLARES WAR ON 9MM AMMO
title: MAY 31 2022 - BIDEN ADMIN DECLARES WAR ON 9MM AMMO
description:
Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announces legislation that would impose a national ‘freeze’ on handgun ownership in the wake of Uvalde, Texas school shooting. Meanwhile, President Joe Biden declares that the Second Amendment was ‘never absolute’. The Department of Justice launches an investigation into the failed police response of the Uvalde Elementary School shooting. Unilever CEO tells Elon Musk to calm down after Musk calls ESG a scam in response to Tesla getting chopped from the S&P 500 Index. Russia says it will open Ukrainian ports for ships exporting food but only if the U.S. lifts sanctions on Russian exports and financial transactions.  

Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


Go to patriotmobile.com/poso/ or call 972-PATRIOT to get free activation with offer code POSO
content:encoded:
